programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: When it comes to your health, being honest with your doctor is vital to maintaining your wellbeing. Whether it’s a nagging pain or your family’s medical history, find out all the information you must tell your physician.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Contagious or Not? Are You at Risk
programme.desc: Find out the 10 most common ailments, and which ones are contagious. Plus, a dangerous virus that often masquerades as a rash. Is your child at risk? And, quick cures for urinary tract infections and the stomach flu.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Things That Make You Go Ewww!
programme.desc: When it comes to disgusting conditions, doctors see more than their fair share. ingrown hairs, gnarly nails and scaly feet are just the tip of the iceberg of the ick factor! See easy solutions to banish ick for good.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Plagued by rumors of crack use, meth use, cancer and his HIV status, pop star Aaron Carter comes to The Doctors in a world exclusive to find out what’s really going. Can Aaron on be saved from The wreckage of superstardom?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Plagued by rumors of crack use, meth use, cancer and his HIV status, pop star Aaron Carter comes to The Doctors in a world exclusive to find out what’s really going. Can Aaron on be saved from The wreckage of superstardom? In Part 2 of our Aaron Carter exclusive, The Doctors is tasked with delivering the news to Aaron about his blood tests for HIV and meth use.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Mom accused of feeding her own kids dog feces? ASMR dandruff scraping? Why some are soothed by watching people scrape their scalps! Is elderly drinking on the rise? The medical trend that could be harming your grandparents! Woman celebrates massive excess skin removal! Cauliflower chocolate smoothie? Man’s penis turns to bone? Uncovering singer Camila Cabello's mental health tip is for a stress free day!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Can’t get rid of dark under-eye circles? Constantly having bad hair days? Find out what your body may be telling you! And, learn which eyebrow color may be an early indicator of diabetes.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: What to Do if Disaster Strikes
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, would you know what to do? Are you prepared for earthquakes, tornadoes, hurricanes, blizzards and more? Plus, five things you can do to increase your chance of surviving a plane crash.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Embarrassing, Gross, and Wild Special brings you some of The Doctors’ most unforgettable moments! See “The Great Pop-Off”! Relive Dr. Pimple Popper’s biggest and best pops! Marvel at the courage of guests who shared Their most embarrassing problems to raise awareness! From the huge, painful keloids that isolated a school teacher to The severe birthmarks that tormented a young woman, These guests stepped out of the shadows for help. Don’t miss one man’s 315-pound transformation! Laugh and learn as Dr. Ordon and NBA star Jon Salley undergo prostate exams backstage! Score a simple fix for dry, chalky elbows.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors tackle topics from the bedroom to the bathroom that make even the most stalwart blush. Hear S-E-X-planations for how to turn up the heat in the bedroom, and get solutions for ugly feet, spider veins and more!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: What Every Woman is Afraid to Ask
programme.desc: The Doctors answer the questions you’re too embarrassed to talk about – even with your best friend! Find out how to improve your love life, eliminate body odor and more!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: THE DOCTORS exclusive: “Plastic surgery intervention” for a woman who has had three Brazilian butt lifts but says she won’t stop until she has the biggest butt in the world! Plus, he’s been called “the sexiest doctor in America” – Dr. Mike drops by to break hearts and give the latest update on his love life! Then, it’s a shocking viral video you have to see to believe – a 7-year-old girl whose heart beats outside of her chest due to a rare congenital condition! And, THE DOCTORS takes on the hottest viral challenge on YouTube – the spicy noodle challenge!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Are you your own worst critic? From sweaty armpits to thick ankles, see new solutions for your most “embarrassing” body problems. And, get simple, at-home remedies for brittle nails.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Bothered by bad-smelling belches? Problem with pinworms? Get answers to the questions that make you go, “What the yuck?!” And, The Doctors’ Motherhood Survival Club tackles the biggest issues modern moms face.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Exclusive: Watch the story of Joey, who was born without legs and abandoned by his family in Romania. The Doctors give him a life changing surprise. Then, the story of 9-year-old Briana, who must sleep under a blue light every night to stay alive.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A mother hears her son’s voice for the very first time. See the cutting edge procedure that restored her hearing after 15 years of silence. Then, should your child take a break from ADHD medicines? Plus, are you overtreating your skin and hair?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors discusses the wackiest health headlines! Hilarious photos of toddlers in a fake tan mess and how to safely clean up a bad tan! Which state has the most psychopaths? The best beauty buys all for under $10! The Doctors diagnoses your toilet dilemmas in a segment called, “What The Flush!” Instant treatment to reverse tremors?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors “Race to Erase 10 Years” on a lucky audience member! Just wait until you see The jaw-dropping results! Candle explosion: could it happen to you? People are suing The major cereal companies over “nutritious” and “wholesome” claims! Guest loses 170 pounds but it isn’t enough! Find out what still is weighing her down. The Doctors discusses a new study that claims going vegan leads to depression! Product claims to whiten teeth 6 shades lighter in just 3 days? Does it work or is it 50 shades of disappointment? We’re putting it to The test! Plus, The water bottle danger you haven’t heard!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Improve your health from A to Z! From anti-aging to zits, The Doctors tackle common health concerns and share the latest medical treatments, simple cures and surprising tips to keep you in tip-top shape.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Plagued by persistent and frustrating body problems like dandruff, blackheads or excessive sweating? The latest installment of Ask Our Doctors shows you how to get rid of pesky ailments for good!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Dr. G: Medical Examiner says that the dead don’t keep secrets. Watch a simulated autopsy, and learn ways to keep premature death and disease from your doorstep. And, a procedure that can shrink you six sizes in less than six hours.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Eat, Sleep, Poop at Every Age
programme.desc: Eat, sleep, poop; we all do it! The Doctors answers your questions about the three most common bodily functions! Get clear on food allergy rumors, discover the risks of snoring and learn how to combat the dangers of constipation.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Best Treatments From Head To Toe
programme.desc: The Doctors share treatments from head to toe. Brooke Burke reveals how to regain your pre-pregnancy figure. And, Olympic champion Steve Holcomb shares how eye surgery helped him win gold.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Backaches, allergies and toothaches are among the most common recurring health problems. Find out how to keep your chronic medical issues from coming back, and learn to keep body odor and bad breath at bay.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: 20 Fast Fixes For Loads Of Problems
programme.desc: Learn how maple syrup reduces the risk of cancer, the advantages of vinegar and treat five ailments for one dollar. Plus, if you think vodka is only good for making cosmos, think again! Discover the health benefits behind the bar.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a The Doctors Exclusive: Gloria Gaynor’s major spine surgery. Gloria and her surgeon, Dr. Hooman Melamed explains the risky procedure. Tips to protect your family this flu season! Testing new non-surgical procedure to rid you of saggy skin and those dreaded jowls. The man behind some of Hollywood’s biggest superheroes shares his top workout moves anyone can do at home. The surprising germy spots in your kitchen!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Comedienne Niecy Nash goes on assignment to uncover mystifying body quirks and what you can do about them. And, a new, minimally invasive procedure promises to put an end to heavy periods. Plus, common sex mistakes men make.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A domestic violence survivor is nominated by her daughter for the ultimate Hollywood makeover and you won’t believe the transformation! The Dahm triplets put at-home ancestry kits to the test! The results will shock you! One yogi showcases her menstrual stain to the world … is her bold decision gross or empowering? Meet the record-breaking martial artists people are calling the modern-day Bruce Lee! Score Rosie Mercado’s must-have tips for full-figure fashion! If given the choice, would you choose a million dollars or true love? Find out why seniors are having the best sex! Plus, a simple way to move forward from emotional pain … today!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Woman addicted to eating uncooked pasta for 30 years writes in to THE DOCTORS to save her life! Could her obsession with macaroni noodles be cured? Then, a body builder dies … from a protein overdose? And, why the internet has everyone cringing over the callus removal videos? Plus, could the hormones in fast food be to blame for one boy’s “A” cup breast? THE DOCTORS discusses the startling links between hormones and your health. And, caught on tape: a crazy calf cramp that seems to have a mind of its own! Then, see what happens when the “Yum Yuck Crew” kids give their critiques on avocado ice cream … will they like it? And, breast surgeon Dr. Kristi Funk gives you the “Breast Case Scenario” on your most embarrassing nipple issues.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A celebrity hairstylist that’s groomed some of the hottest men in Hollywood changes the lives of homeless people with a haircut! The Doctors first wedding for a couple whose story went viral! What’s The Real Deal with a wearable device that relieves headaches? Does it work? Infant sleeping dangers every parent must hear! Simple trick for a perfect burger!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Do you want to better your health, but can’t seem to find the time? The Doctors reveal 50 ways to improve your health, and each takes just five minutes or less! And, learn simple housecleaning tips that don’t cost a dime.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Party crashed by unwelcome visitor – poop bacteria? New study may lead way to offset Alzheimer’s. Bizarre in the ER – you won’t believe what one patient got tangled up in and how another patient’s throat became rotted. Could trauma be healed through sex work? One survivor shares her story. Why woman was denied a manicure? When you’re under the knife, do you know what’s going on in the OR? The secret ingredient to take your smoothies to the next level!
